item.title: IEETek P2400 Portable Power Station / Solar Generator
item.description:
Feature:
  • Massive capacity of 2048Wh.
  • 100% recharge in about 1.5 hours for super-fast recharging.
  • LiFePO4 battery for enhanced safety.
  • Built-in wireless charger for convenient device charging.
  • Seamless EPS with 10ms switching time for uninterrupted power supply and superior BMS protection for safety.
  • 2400W AC output (4800W surge) for running various devices.
  • Versatile output ports to supply 16 devices simultaneously.

item.title: IEETek SH4000 Portable Power Station / Solar Generator
item.description:
Feature:
  • Convenient transport with rugged wheels and telescopic pull handle.
  • Up to 10.24kWh expandable battery capacity.
  • Max. 600W/3000W PV input power supports mountable & portable solar panels.
  • Perfect for RVs & trailers, and yachts.
  • Super fast recharge from 0% to 100% in just 1.5 hours.
  • 4000W AC output and 8000W surge for running power-hungry devices.
  • Seamless UPS with 10ms switching time.

item.title: IEETek Portable All-in-one ESS SH4000
item.description:
Feature:
  • Convenient Transport with Rugged Wheels and Telescopic Pull Handle.
  • Robust Hybrid All-in-one ESS for On and Off-Grid Use.
